1.title: June 30th 1960
1.plot: First in the Congo History Series - JUNE 30th 1960. On June 30 1960, Congo's independence day, Lumumba makes an impromptu speech following those of King Baudoin and president Kasavubu.

3.title: Colonial Brigade
3.plot: While the history books have traditionally failed to acknowledge the colonial troops efforts, it is undeniable that Congo, among others, played a significant military and strategic role during WW2.

-1.title: Congo Free States
-1.plot: In November of 1877 Leopold II, King of the Belgians, formed the Committee for Studies of the Upper Congo to explore the African interior along the Congo River and open it up to European trade. It was later renamed the Association Internationale du Congo.

imdb.plot outline: The Congo: History Series is a collection of short documentary bits, which cover some of the historical events that are continuing to shape this nation, both on the international scene and at a local level. It's a chance to learn, switch perspective, fact-check and maybe even start a conversation on the significance of our past in the making of our future. It's never too late to know about our history. It certainly isn't too soon.
imdb.title: Congo: History Series
plot: The _Congo: History Series_ (qv) is a collection of short documentary bits, which cover some of the historical events that are continuing to shape this nation, both on the international scene and at a local level. It's a chance to learn, switch perspective, fact-check and maybe even start a conversation on the significance of our past in the making of our future. It's never too late to know about our history. It certainly isn't too soon.::Mina Malu
